4027551637,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-scientist-at-world-food-programme-4027551637?position=3&pageNum=0&refId=6VwybPj3KxlwPhEdg0E3FQ%3D%3D&trackingId=UDVhRs9Tp39RpSTeqlZ5rQ%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Data Scientist,World Food Programme,"Rome, Latium, Italy","DEADLINE FOR APPLICATIONS

WFP celebrates and embraces diversity. It is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all its employees and encourages qualified candidates to apply irrespective of race, colour, national origin, ethnic or social background, genetic information, gender, gender identity and/or expression, sexual orientation, religion or belief, HIV status or disability.

The World Food Programme is the world’s largest humanitarian organization saving lives in emergencies and using food assistance to build a pathway to peace, stability and prosperity, for people recovering from conflict, disasters and the impact of climate change.

At WFP, people are at the heart of everything we do and the vision of the future WFP workforce is one of diverse, committed, skilled, and high performing teams, selected on merit, operating in a healthy and inclusive work environment, living WFP's values (Integrity, Collaboration, Commitment, Humanity, and Inclusion) and working with partners to save and change the lives of those WFP serves.
To learn more about WFP, visit our website: https://www.wfp.org and follow us on social media to keep up with our latest news: YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter.
WFP is a 2020 Nobel Peace Prize Laureate.
WFP offers a highly inclusive, diverse, and multicultural working environment.

WFP invests in the personal & professional development of its employees through a range of training, accreditation, coaching, mentorship, and other programs as well as through internal mobility opportunities.

A career path in WFP provides an exciting opportunity to work across the various country, regional and global offices around the world, and with passionate colleagues who work tirelessly to ensure that effective humanitarian assistance reaches millions of people across the globe.
We offer an attractive compensation package (please refer to the Terms and Conditions section of this vacancy announcement).
Background And Purpose Of The Assignment

The Data Science team within the Forecasting & Early Warning Unit, in the Analysis Planning and Performance (APP) division, is a specialized team dedicated to addressing the challenge of modelling and forecasting food insecurity and its drivers, through the innovative application of AI and data science techniques. By leveraging large heterogenous datasets and advanced algorithms, the team can identify patterns and trends that are not immediately apparent and predict the impact of impending natural and human generated hazards, enabling timely interventions and anticipatory actions in vulnerable areas. The work is crucial in facilitating data-driven decision-making for governments and humanitarian organizations, allowing proactive strategies in combating food crises and their underlying causes. This approach helps to mitigate the impact of potential crises on affected populations, improving resilience and ensuring food security.

The Early Warning and Forecasting Unit is developing an early warning tool to detect impending food crises, with initial pilots in high-priority countries. Working with the private sector, this project will harnesses expertise in artificial intelligence and product innovation alongside WFP's operational insights and localized data. The objective is to generate early warning signals that facilitate proactive interventions, integrating real-time data, satellite imagery, news data streams, and Google analytics to enhance response capabilities and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of efforts to prevent food crises in vulnerable communities. As part of the team, the Data Scientist will be responsible of designing and developing advanced AI solutions to analyze trends and forecast potential crises, producing early warning signals. The models will be developed in production-ready code to ensure smooth maintenance and deployment. The role will also require to collaborate closely with stakeholders to tailor the tool specifically to the needs and conditions of the target regions, ensuring its effectiveness and relevance.
The Consultant will be responsible for the following activities:
Research, design and implement AI models for estimating food insecurity and produce early warning of impending crises.
Support ad-hoc data explorations and analysis for the project, by means of traditional statistical analysis as well as state-of-the-art data science methodologies.
In collaboration with the software engineering team, support the design and the implementation of production-ready data pipelines.
Support the writing of technical papers and reports to be submitted to peer-reviewed international journals.
Participate in workshops, meetings and conferences to present the technical aspects of the project, within the organization and externally.
Ensure adherence to WFP policies regarding data, including data privacy, security, management, and code documentation.
Participate in field missions to WFP country offices as required.
Deliverables At The End Of The Contract
Technical inputs to the development of Early Warning System, including the code and methodology for generation of the signals.
Deployment of AI models in a production environment
Maintenance of the code base following industry’s best practices.
Submission of research papers to high impact journals.
Participation in project meetings, scientific committee meetings and dissemination events
Presentations on the technical aspects of the project, as needed.
Master’s degree in engineering, computer science, physics, mathematics or similar.
At least 5 years of professional experience in a data science-related role, including PhDs and other academic positions.
Python programming skills and experience with data science libraries (pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, Keras, etc)
Advanced knowledge of statistics and passion for machine learning with an understanding of algorithms
Experience in deploying and maintaining AI solution in Cloud Environments
Experience in querying SQL databases is required
Experience in the following fields is an asset: forecasting Time Series
column2: NLP
column3: Generative AI
column4: Deep Learning Libraries (PyTorch, TensorFlow)

About Wfp

The World Food Programme is the world’s largest humanitarian organization saving lives in emergencies and using food assistance to build a pathway to peace, stability and prosperity, for people recovering from conflict, disasters and the impact of climate change.

Problem-solving e approccio orientato ai risultati.

La risorsa sarà inserita in un progetto in ambito bancario su un prodotto sull'antiriciclaggio.

Conoscenza dei principali algoritmi di ML e DL
Conoscenza approfondita delle tecniche di Computer Vision e riconoscimento immagini
Conoscenza delle architetture distribuite e i principali protocolli di scambio dati come MQTT e HTTP

TopNetwork s.p.a è un’azienda leader nel settore ICT ad alta Innovazione tecnologica, collocata tra i principali player per grandi aziende e istituzioni sul territorio nazionale.

Le nostre soluzioni integrano l’Intelligenza Artificiale con altre tecnologie (blockchain, Cloud, Data Science, Internet of Things) e spaziano dalla Robotica ai sistemi satellitari, ai sistemi di analisi visiva, ai motori di ricerca semantica e machine learning.
Una realtà stabile, riconosciuta e radicata sul mercato con 8 sedi operative aziendali in Italia e con un organico di più di 700 dipendenti.

Lo scorso anno siamo entrati nel gruppo internazionale SMART4ENGINEERING, che raccoglie realtà focalizzate in aree complementari dell’ingegneria digitale e della R&D, per consentire ai clienti di affrontare la digital trasformation.
Il gruppo SMART4 è impegnato su progetti di scala Europea (Italia, Francia, Spagna, Portogallo e Tunisia) con un organico di più di 3500 dipendenti--> https://www.smart4engineering.com/
Possibilità di accedere a contenuti formativi multilingua
Possibilità di accedere a diverse piattaforme e-learning per accrescere le competenze tecniche e quelle trasversali
Retribuzioni commisurate a seniority e profilo professionale del candidato
Possibilità di inserirsi in una realtà in espansione, solida, affidabile, dinamica e flessibile, dove poter esprimere le proprie attitudini
Inserimento in un team di professionisti che si riconosce dalla disponibilità, puntualità nelle risposte, competenza, capacità di apprendere dalle lesson learned, creatività nella soluzioni
Correttezza e integrità: crediamo nell’etica del lavoro, quindi nella condivisione di obiettivi e in un rapporto quanto più possibile autentico con i nostri collaboratori.
Sede di lavoro: Roma (Ibrido con due giorni di presenza a settimana)
Si prega di inviare il CV dettagliato con l'autorizzazione al trattamento dei dati personali (ai sensi degli artt. 12, 13 e 14 del Regolamento EU 2016/679).
Il presente annuncio è rivolto ad entrambi i sessi, ai sensi delle leggi 903/77 e 125/91, e a persone di tutte le età e tutte le nazionalità, ai sensi dei decreti legislativi 215/03 e 216/03.
Tale annuncio è, inoltre, rivolto a tutti i facenti parte di Categorie Protette, legge 68/99.

TopNetwork S.p.A è alla ricerca un Data Science Specialist con le seguenti caratteristiche:


  • Conoscenza approfondita di Python e framework di ML e DL come TensorFlow e Pytorch
  • Conoscenza dei principali algoritmi di ML e DL
  • Conoscenza approfondita delle tecniche di Computer Vision e riconoscimento immagini
  • Conoscenza delle architetture distribuite e i principali protocolli di scambio dati come MQTT e HTTP
  • Esperienza nello sviluppo di software su microcontrollori come Arduino e relativa sensoristica
  • Conoscenza dell’Edge Computing e il loro utilizzo nell’ambito IoT
  • Conoscenza dell’ambiente Docker
  • Conoscenza del sistema operativo Linux
  • Capacità di analizzare problemi complessi e trovare soluzioni innovative
  • Capacità di scrivere documentazione tecnica di progetto

4023614210,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-scientist-at-iconsulting-4023614210?position=7&pageNum=0&refId=6VwybPj3KxlwPhEdg0E3FQ%3D%3D&trackingId=B%2BZM%2FIjxZXzmufnAi4cwnw%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Data Scientist,ICONSULTING,"Rome, Latium, Italy","Siamo una Data Driven Transformation Company specializzata in design e delivery di soluzioni, metodologie, algoritmi e tecnologie capaci di trasformare e potenziare le aziende clienti con la valorizzazione del principale e più abbondante asset del mercato odierno: i dati.

La nostra realtà nasce da un gruppo di ricercatori universitari e siamo oggi partner strategico di oltre 200 aziende clienti e di tutti i più importanti vendor tecnologici internazionali. Abbiamo all’attivo più di 1.500 progetti di successo realizzati in oltre 20 anni di crescita costante e continua.
Con sedi a Bologna, Roma, Milano e Napoli, abbiamo una struttura di oltre 450 professionisti altamente specializzati.

Grazie ai servizi di Advisory, Application Maintenance, Big Data Platform, Integrated Platforms, Blockchain, Business Analytics, Location Analytics, AI & Machine Learning, Performance Management e Customer Data Platform supportiamo tutti i livelli aziendali dei nostri clienti dando forma e concretezza alla loro visione.

Siamo alla ricerca di un Data Scientist appassionato di machine learning, modelli analitici e intelligenza artificiale. La risorsa che cerchiamo avrà maturato almeno 4 anni di esperienza nel campo dell’analisi e modellazione dei dati, presso primarie realtà consulenziali o di industry.
Progettazione e sviluppo di soluzioni di Machine Learning e analisi dati per i clienti
Progettazione e creazione di algoritmi avanzati di machine learning e deep learning, in particolare in cloud
Utilizzo di strumenti e linguaggi per la manipolazione dei dati
Proporre soluzioni innovative in ambito analytics
Progettare e implementare data pipelines per integrare dati eterogenei in un’unica piattaforma
Sviluppo di modelli predittivi tramite tecniche di Machine Learning e/o Deep Learning
Gestione end to end di progetti analitici: dall’esigenza di business alla comunicazione efficace dei risultati di analisi
Creazione di dashboard e insight per semplificare il processo decisionale degli stakeholder.
Laurea magistrale STEM (Informatica, Ingegneria Informatica, Statistica, Matematica o affini), costituisce titolo preferenziale il possesso di un PhD
4 anni di esperienza in posizione analoga, sarà considerato preferenziale se in contesto consulenziale
Conoscenza avanzata di Python e delle librerie per la manipolazione dati e sviluppo modelli
Comprovata conoscenza dei modelli di machine learning realizzata su piattaforme cloud
Esperienza in progettazione e sviluppo di soluzioni di Machine Learning e analisi dati per i clienti
Buona conoscenza delle architetture e tecnologie moderne in ambito dati e AI, advanced analytics e machine learning
Esperienza nel coordinamento di un team di progetto.
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese (almeno B2)
Sarà considerato un plus la conoscenza di varie tecnologie che spaziano tra:
Piattaforme Cloud per Analytics (AWS, Azure, Google)
Strumenti di ETL e di API Management
Buone competenze comunicative anche verso stakeholder non tecnici.

Ricerchiamo persone che, oltre alle qualità tecniche, abbiano una forte motivazione, una grande passione per l'innovazione, e che si distinguano per entusiasmo, impegno, spirito di iniziativa e sguardo al futuro.
Ai candidati selezionati verrà offerto un percorso di sviluppo di carriera e crescita strutturato per obiettivi, con processi formativi sia in ambito tech sia in ambito soft skills.
Nel pacchetto retributivo sono compresi assicurazione medica integrativa, buoni pasto, convenzioni dipendenti usufruibili su tutto il territorio nazionale, dotazioni integrative per lo smart working.
Inquadramento: contratto di lavoro dipendente a tempo indeterminato

Lavorare in Iconsulting è un percorso di crescita sfidante e motivante. Crediamo in un modello di collaborazione in cui instaurare un rapporto duraturo di fiducia con i nostri collaboratori e clienti. Potrai lavorare in modo flessibile e per obiettivi grazie a una politica consolidata di lavoro Agile, vivendo le tue giornate lavorative in spazi aziendali moderni e accoglienti.

I candidati ambosessi (D.lgs. n. 198/2006) sono invitati ad inviare il curriculum comprensivo di autorizzazione al trattamento dei dati personali ai sensi dell’art. 13 del Decreto Legislativo 30 giugno 2003, n. 196 “Codice in materia di protezione dei dati personali” e dell’art. 13 del GDPR (Regolamento UE 2016/679).

Siamo una Data Driven Transformation Company specializzata in design e delivery di soluzioni, metodologie, algoritmi e tecnologie capaci di trasformare e potenziare le aziende clienti con la valorizzazione del principale e più abbondante asset del mercato odierno: i dati.

3994592558,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/machine-learning-engineer-at-ntt-data-italia-3994592558?position=8&pageNum=0&refId=6VwybPj3KxlwPhEdg0E3FQ%3D%3D&trackingId=OMtjV1AQ2NSsfplGm0c0hA%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Machine Learning Engineer,NTT DATA Italia,"Rome, Latium, Italy","NTT DATA, è tra i principali player a livello mondiale in ambito IT services. Con più di 151.000 professionisti in oltre 50 Paesi in tutto il mondo, siamo protagonisti e acceleratori della trasformazione digitale offrendo ai nostri clienti soluzioni tecnologiche e innovative progettate su misura. Il motore di NTTDATA sono le persone, ognuna con la propria unicità, talento ed attitudine. Abbiamo costruito una Smile Working Company in cui la cura, l’ascolto delle persone, il loro benessere e sviluppo delle competenze sono la nostra priorità. Abbiamo creato spazi di lavoro che favoriscono il senso di comunità e lo scambio costruttivo di esperienze.
Guardiamo al nostro domani con la stessa passione di ieri e abbiamo bisogno anche del tuo talento!
Nell’area di Innovation & Advanced Technologies di NTT Data Italia, stiamo ampliando il team di Digital Linguistics & Human Behaviour che si occupa di AI e GenAI.

La figura di Machine Learning Engineer si occuperà dello sviluppo di assistenti virtuali basati su AI generativa dotati di caratteristiche empatiche, dell’implementazione di applicativi di NLP/GENAI, di attività di configurazione e rilascio dei software sulle principali piattaforme cloud.
E’ Richiesta Esperienza Di Almeno 2 Anni In
Java, Python, Docker e Kubernetes (nice to have: C#, Node Js/Typescript)
Azure: App service, CosmosDB, Storage Account (nice to have: Azure Open AI, Azure Bot, CLU, Azure DevOps)
Completano il profilo buona conoscenza della lingua inglese, passione per la tecnologia e curiosità per l’innovazione.
Sedi: Milano, Roma, Bologna, Napoli, Salerno, Cosenza

<icon class=""show-more-less-html__button-icon show-more-less-button-icon lazy-loaded"" aria-hidden=""true"" aria-busy=""false""><svg xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"" width=""16"" height=""16"" preserveAspectRatio=""xMinYMin meet"" focusable=""false"" class=""lazy-loaded"" aria-busy=""false""><path d=""M8 7l-5.9 4L1 9.5l6.2-4.2c.5-.3 1.2-.3 1.7 0L15 9.5 13.9 11 8 7z"" fill=""currentColor""></path></svg></icon>

Il nostro team di Artificial Intelligence Engineering si impegna a supportare i clienti nel percorso di adozione dell’intelligenza artificiale attraverso la realizzazione di factory di soluzioni di AI, azionabili e integrate nell'architettura e nei processi aziendali.

La figura dell’AI Engineer progetta soluzioni software di Machine Learning (ML) scalabili per i casi d'uso dei clienti e le industrializza per l’esecuzione in produzione garantendo i livelli richiesti di performance, sicurezza e governabilità.

L’AI Engineer lavora a stretto contatto con altre figure di Bip xTech, come Cloud Data Architects, Data Scientists e Data Engineer, per realizzare soluzioni ML di alta qualità sotto ogni aspetto: disegnando e implementando per il team strumenti di lavoro come le piattaforme di MLOps, fornendo linee guida e best practice sulle architetture dati e di AI, supportando l’implementazione del software e funzionalità di osservabilità dell’AI, e altro ancora.
L’AI Engineer inoltre contribuirà alla Bip xTech Data Community con attività di ricerca, scouting tecnologico, concept di nuove soluzioni e sviluppo del business sui clienti di BIP.
Le posizioni aperte riguardano profili sia junior che senior.
Sarai tu a entrare nel nostro team?
Laurea specialistica in Ingegneria Informatica, Data Science, Informatica o discipline affini (STEM).
Esperienza nello sviluppo di software in almeno un linguaggio, come per esempio: Python, Scala, Java, e/o simili
Esperienza nel disegno di soluzioni software e nell’implementazione di strutture dati, algoritmi
Esperienza nell’utilizzo degli strumenti di Code Repository, come per esempio: GitHub, GitLab, Azure DevOps e/o simili.
Conoscenza dei concetti, algoritmi e metodologie di Machine Learning.
Esperienza con linguaggi SQL per il design, query e gestione dei database
column2: esperienza nell’utilizzo di linguaggi SQL per le attività di ETL.

column1: Indispensabile la conoscenza fluente di Italiano e Inglese professionali.
Esperienza nell’utilizzo delle principali piattaforme cloud (Google, AWS, Azure)
Conoscenza dei concetti e tecnologie di Big Data e Data Warehousing (esempio: Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Kafka)
Esperienza con framework e metodologie di Deep Learning (esempio: Tensorflow, PyTorch, HuggingFace Transformers, LangChain).
Conoscenza di framework di versionamento di dati e/o modelli (esempio: MLFlow, DVC, WanDB…).
Esperienza con framework di lavoro AGILE (esempio: Scrum, Kanban).
People at the center of our culture
Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialità e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.
Lavorare in BIP è un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti.

Avrai la possibilità di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attività e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, l’autonomia e la capacità di assumerti responsabilità e metterti in gioco.
Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi all’avanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.
Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworking fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.
Valorizziamo l’unicità e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutti abbiano pari opportunità di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversità e all’inclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integrità e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, più ampi.
Promuoviamo l’inserimento e l’integrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette – in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99 –.
Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prenderemo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.
Se c’è un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte all’interno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.
L’iter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.
L’ordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.
In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunità future.
Se dovessi identificare ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.
Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato l’esperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: l’innovazione e la digitalizzazione.

Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 5000 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze più all’avanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.
Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualità su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.

Crediamo nel valore dell’eccellenza, che è la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono di lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.

Entra nel nostro mondo.

Trasforma insieme a noi.

AI ENGINEER

Quale sarà la tua sfida?

Il nostro team di Artificial Intelligence Engineering si impegna a supportare i clienti nel percorso di adozione dell’intelligenza artificiale attraverso la realizzazione di factory di soluzioni di AI, azionabili e integrate nell'architettura e nei processi aziendali.

La figura dell’AI Engineer progetta soluzioni software di Machine Learning (ML) scalabili per i casi d'uso dei clienti e le industrializza per l’esecuzione in produzione garantendo i livelli richiesti di performance, sicurezza e governabilità.

L’AI Engineer lavora a stretto contatto con altre figure di Bip xTech, come Cloud Data Architects, Data Scientists e Data Engineer, per realizzare soluzioni ML di alta qualità sotto ogni aspetto: disegnando e implementando per il team strumenti di lavoro come le piattaforme di MLOps, fornendo linee guida e best practice sulle architetture dati e di AI, supportando l’implementazione del software e funzionalità di osservabilità dell’AI, e altro ancora.

L’AI Engineer inoltre contribuirà alla Bip xTech Data Community con attività di ricerca, scouting tecnologico, concept di nuove soluzioni e sviluppo del business sui clienti di BIP.

Le posizioni aperte riguardano profili sia junior che senior.

Sarai tu a entrare nel nostro team?

3989112570,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/machine-learning-engineer-at-translated-3989112570?position=15&pageNum=0&refId=6VwybPj3KxlwPhEdg0E3FQ%3D%3D&trackingId=b7pdo%2FjtGWTBhi7qD0HHBw%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Machine Learning Engineer,Translated,Greater Rome Metropolitan Area,"About Translated
Translated is a leading company in AI-enabled translation services. We are on a mission to allow everyone to understand and be understood in their own language.

Our success stems from a unique blend of the world’s #1 adaptive neural machine translation technology (IDC MarketScape 2022), the largest network of vetted, native-speaking professional translators, and top-ranked AI-enabled text, audio, and video translation tools (Gartner, 2022).

By leveraging a seamless symbiosis of artificial intelligence and human creativity, we design custom localization projects that were previously unthinkable, helping more than 280,000 clients grow their businesses worldwide.

We’re looking for a passionate Machine Learning Engineer to join the Translated Data Science and AI Production team in our HQ in Pi Campus, Rome. The persona will be responsible for building and maintaining the Machine Learning and AI services of the company.
Lead the development of Machine Learning services
Improve and maintain our GPU cluster
Improve and maintain our API ecosystem
Optimize and put in production Machine Learning models
Collaborate with other team members on internal and external models
Build high-quality reusable code that can be used in the future
Develop functional and sustainable applications with clean codes
Collaborate with a multidisciplinary team of product owners, designers, developers and system administrators
Collaborate with the ModernMT and Research teams to create the best Translation Engine ever.
Master degree in Computer Science or SW Engineering courses
Proven experience in developing and maintaining scalable Machine Learning and AI services
Deep Knowledge of Python, Java and Bash
Experience with Relational DBMS ( MySQL, PostgreSQL )
Experience with NoSQL DBMS ( Redis, MongoDB )
Experience with version control GIT and Github workflow
Proactive, self-driven and enjoys solving complex problems, not just in the primary area of responsibility but across boundaries.

Translated is hosted at Pi Campus, a working environment immersed in nature where 7 luxury villas have been converted into functional offices to foster talent growth. Pi Campus is also a venture firm created by Translated to reinvest part of its profits into promising AI startups.
Bonuses and incentives for employees who quit smoking, ride a bicycle to work, or adopt a child.

At Translated, we proudly embrace and celebrate each individual's unique qualities to our team, regardless of race, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other differences. We recognize that these diverse perspectives empower us to overcome challenges, foster innovation, and drive excellence. As an inclusive and equal-opportunity employer, we are committed to cultivating an environment where everyone feels welcome, valued, and supported to achieve their full potential.

About Translated

Translated is a leading company in AI-enabled translation services. We are on a mission to allow everyone to understand and be understood in their own language.

Our success stems from a unique blend of the world’s #1 adaptive neural machine translation technology (IDC MarketScape 2022), the largest network of vetted, native-speaking professional translators, and top-ranked AI-enabled text, audio, and video translation tools (Gartner, 2022).

By leveraging a seamless symbiosis of artificial intelligence and human creativity, we design custom localization projects that were previously unthinkable, helping more than 280,000 clients grow their businesses worldwide.

We’re looking for a passionate Machine Learning Engineer to join the Translated Data Science and AI Production team in our HQ in Pi Campus, Rome. The persona will be responsible for building and maintaining the Machine Learning and AI services of the company.


Key responsabilities

  • Lead the development of Machine Learning services
  • Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines
  • Improve and maintain our GPU cluster
  • Improve and maintain our API ecosystem
  • Optimize and put in production Machine Learning models
  • Collaborate with other team members on internal and external models
  • Coding, debugging and testing
  • Build high-quality reusable code that can be used in the future
  • Develop functional and sustainable applications with clean codes
  • Collaborate with a multidisciplinary team of product owners, designers, developers and system administrators
  • Collaborate with the ModernMT and Research teams to create the best Translation Engine ever.


Requirements

  • Master degree in Computer Science or SW Engineering courses
  • 3+ years of working experience
  • Proven experience in developing and maintaining scalable Machine Learning and AI services
  • Deep Knowledge of Python, Java and Bash
  • Experience with Kubernetes and Docker
  • Experience with Relational DBMS ( MySQL, PostgreSQL )
  • Experience with NoSQL DBMS ( Redis, MongoDB )
  • Experience with version control GIT and Github workflow
  • Proactive, self-driven and enjoys solving complex problems, not just in the primary area of responsibility but across boundaries.


Headquarter

Translated is hosted at Pi Campus, a working environment immersed in nature where 7 luxury villas have been converted into functional offices to foster talent growth. Pi Campus is also a venture firm created by Translated to reinvest part of its profits into promising AI startups.


Benefits and Perks

  • Gym
  • Swimming Pool
  • Kickboxing, TRX, and Pilates classes
  • Table Tennis and Football table
  • Kitchen and snacks
  • Bonuses and incentives for employees who quit smoking, ride a bicycle to work, or adopt a child.

Learn more about our company: https://translated.com/work-at-translated-onboarding.


Diversity statement

At Translated, we proudly embrace and celebrate each individual's unique qualities to our team, regardless of race, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other differences. We recognize that these diverse perspectives empower us to overcome challenges, foster innovation, and drive excellence. As an inclusive and equal-opportunity employer, we are committed to cultivating an environment where everyone feels welcome, valued, and supported to achieve their full potential.

<icon class=""show-more-less-html__button-icon show-more-less-button-icon lazy-loaded"" aria-hidden=""true"" aria-busy=""false""><svg xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"" width=""16"" height=""16"" preserveAspectRatio=""xMinYMin meet"" focusable=""false"" class=""lazy-loaded"" aria-busy=""false""><path d=""M8 7l-5.9 4L1 9.5l6.2-4.2c.5-.3 1.2-.3 1.7 0L15 9.5 13.9 11 8 7z"" fill=""currentColor""></path></svg></icon>
Born in 2004 as Techedge, we have almost 20 years of expertise that enabled us to become what we are today: Avvale!
This path led us to be able to count on over 3,000 employees, present in 11 countries around the world.

We help public and private companies to re-design their business models through the development of innovative and sustainable solutions, which have a positive impact not only on our customers but also on the world we live in!
Through circular economy models, made possible thanks to technological innovation.

You will be part of the practice “Mobile & Cloud”, an area that takes care of analysis, design and implementation of enterprise solutions based on the newest technologies. The team works primarily from home, thanks to our smart working policy.

Cloud architectures and services will be a big focus of the team activities, and you will be required to keep up with the technical evolution of the cloud platforms and stacks as a point of reference for the team of developers. Studying and following certification paths will be encouraged and supported greatly.
Have 3 to 9 years of relevant work experience
Minimum 3 years' relevant experience with Python programming language
Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks effectively
Familiarity with server-side MVC web frameworks
Experience in building and designing a relational database (MySQL, SQL Server or Oracle)
Expertise with cloud technologies (Azure, AWS, GCP)
Experience in working with Docker, Kubernates and other container-based solutions
Have a Bachelor or Master Degree in Computer Science, Computer Science Engineering or in other scientific disciplines
Ability to review requirements and translate them into efficient applications and architecture.

We offer you the opportunity to grow in a young and dynamic team where you can take care of your work-life balance, thanks to our smart working policies and develop your professional career in a meritocratic context!
You will have the opportunity to work and get in touch with international players who will allow you to increase your know-how with a view to future challenges!
We do not consider applications without CV.
This announcement is aimed at candidates of both sexes (L. 903/77).

Enabling What’s Next

Born in 2004 as Techedge, we have almost 20 years of expertise that enabled us to become what we are today: Avvale!

This path led us to be able to count on over 3,000 employees, present in 11 countries around the world.

We help public and private companies to re-design their business models through the development of innovative and sustainable solutions, which have a positive impact not only on our customers but also on the world we live in!


How we do💡

Through circular economy models, made possible thanks to technological innovation.


Role and responsibilities

You will be part of the practice “Mobile &

3922741828,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/ml-engineer-senior-at-ntt-data-italia-3922741828?position=18&pageNum=0&refId=6VwybPj3KxlwPhEdg0E3FQ%3D%3D&trackingId=7ebuB2yTzJ1vv8M7%2BrotmQ%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,ML Engineer Senior,NTT DATA Italia,"Rome, Latium, Italy","NTT DATA, Trusted Global Innovator, è tra i principali player a livello mondiale in ambito IT services. Con più di 140.000 professionisti in oltre 50 Paesi in tutto il mondo, siamo protagonisti e acceleratori della trasformazione digitale offrendo ai nostri clienti soluzioni tecnologiche e innovative progettate su misura. Il motore di NTTDATA sono le persone, ognuna con la propria unicità, talento ed attitudine. Abbiamo costruito una Smile Working Company in cui la cura, l’ascolto delle persone, il loro benessere e sviluppo delle competenze sono la nostra priorità. Abbiamo creato spazi di lavoro che favoriscono il senso di comunità e lo scambio costruttivo di esperienze.
Guardiamo al nostro domani con la stessa passione di ieri e abbiamo bisogno anche del tuo talento!

The ideal candidate as Senior Machine Learning Engineer in NTT DATA will have a solid Generative AI hands-on capability (preferably on Azure/GCP and on-premise GenAI architecture and MLops), mathematical background, experience working on a range of classification, informational retrieval, clustering, and optimization problems, establishing scalable, efficient, automated processes for large scale data analysis, model development, model validation and model implementation.

The Senior Machine Learning Engineer will work alongside experienced Data Scientists, Data and ML Engineers to identify business opportunities, design and create new data pipelines from scratch, from experiments to deploying them in production.
He/She will be responsible for multiple projects, leading the ML Engineers and connecting with the stakeholders.
At least 5 years of production experience working in Data Science or Software Engineering
Deep knowledge of math, probability, statistics and algorithms
At least 6/12 months of experience in Generative AI deployment and underlying architecture handling
Vector Database knowledge is well appreciated
Understanding of data structures, data modeling and software architecture
Fluent in a at least two mainstream programming language (Python, Scala, Java, C++)
Experience in building an infrastructure for technical users, such as Data Scientist, ML practitioners or data consumers/producers
Strong knowledge of Spark, Databricks is a strong plus
Experience developing/deploying ML solutions in one of the public cloud platforms and on a Cross-cloud base, Snowflake knowledge is a plus
Deep knowledge with machine learning frameworks (such as Keras or PyTorch)
Ability to design and implement machine learning pipelines in a production environment
Experience with deployment including knowledge of CI/CD, containerization, and related concepts with a focus over MLops/Re-Training/Drift Management
Ability to train more junior team members in multiple Machine Learning and Deep Learning concepts
Establish and maintain strong relationships with internal team members and external clients
Location: Milano, Bari, Bologna, Cosenza, Napoli, Pisa, Roma, Torino

Guardiamo al nostro domani con la stessa passione di ieri e abbiamo bisogno anche del tuo talento!

The Senior Machine Learning Engineer will work alongside experienced Data Scientists, Data and ML Engineers to identify business opportunities, design and create new data pipelines from scratch, from experiments to deploying them in production.

He/She will be responsible for multiple projects, leading the ML Engineers and connecting with the stakeholders.

4029283070,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/ai-engineer-at-amaris-consulting-4029283070?position=21&pageNum=0&refId=6VwybPj3KxlwPhEdg0E3FQ%3D%3D&trackingId=N%2FmCVEngwVXn%2FcPVmMSUYQ%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,AI engineer,Amaris Consulting,Greater Rome Metropolitan Area,"Who are we?

Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.

At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:

Brief Call: Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!

Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!
Case study: Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.

As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.
We look forward to meeting you!
Join the Amaris Consulting talent network as AI Expert!

Algorithm Design: AI Engineers develop and optimize algorithms for machine learning (ML), deep learning (DL), and other AI techniques. This can involve designing neural networks, predictive models, and machine learning systems.

Data Analysis: A critical part of the job involves analyzing large datasets (Big Data) to identify patterns, trends, and valuable insights. This often requires the use of data mining techniques and data preprocessing.

AI Model Development: AI Engineers build, train, test, and optimize AI models using historical data. These models can be applied to various tasks, such as speech recognition, computer vision, behavior prediction, or automated decision-making.

Implementation and Deployment: Once models are developed, AI Engineers are responsible for integrating them into real-world applications. This includes ensuring that the models perform well in production environments and scaling them as needed.

Research and Innovation: Staying updated with the latest advancements in AI and continually experimenting with new techniques and tools is essential. AI Engineers often contribute to research and development, exploring novel approaches to improve AI capabilitities
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, AI, Data Science, or a related field.
Proficiency in programming languages like Python, R, or Java.
Strong understanding of machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch).
Knowledge of data analysis, data preprocessing, and statistical modeling.
Experience with neural networks, natural language processing (NLP), or computer vision.
Familiarity with cloud computing and deployment tools (AWS, Docker, Kubernetes
Work by objectives with quarterly monitoring.
Lunch vouchers of €8 per working day.
Free access to Mantu Academy platform with more than 500 courses.
🙌 Our ideal candidate recognizes in these values:
Pioneer Spirit: desire to explore new technologies, ideas, and skills to build a more sustainable world.
Care: commitment to promoting diversity, meritocracy, and environmental protection for a better future.
Performance: constant ambition to achieve excellence through creativity, innovation, and technology.
Trust: trust is a pillar of progress, driving freedom, creativity, and innovation.
Independence: independence is the basis for realizing a prosperous and agile future.

Amaris Consulting is an industry-leading Top Employer 2024-certified company that supports its cross-sectors partners at 360 degrees on the software life cycle, providing solutions in different areas such as Strategy management, Data innovation, Business applications & Processes, Design & Development, Digital Workplace and Platform & Security.

Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.

Who are we?

Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System &
column2:
Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.

At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:

Brief Call: Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!

Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!

Case study: Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.

As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.

We look forward to meeting you!

Job Description

Join the Amaris Consulting talent network as AI Expert!

👉 What will you do?


  • Algorithm Design: AI Engineers develop and optimize algorithms for machine learning (ML), deep learning (DL), and other AI techniques. This can involve designing neural networks, predictive models, and machine learning systems.
  • Data Analysis: A critical part of the job involves analyzing large datasets (Big Data) to identify patterns, trends, and valuable insights. This often requires the use of data mining techniques and data preprocessing.
  • AI Model Development: AI Engineers build, train, test, and optimize AI models using historical data. These models can be applied to various tasks, such as speech recognition, computer vision, behavior prediction, or automated decision-making.
  • Implementation and Deployment: Once models are developed, AI Engineers are responsible for integrating them into real-world applications. This includes ensuring that the models perform well in production environments and scaling them as needed.
  • Research and Innovation: Staying updated with the latest advancements in AI and continually experimenting with new techniques and tools is essential. AI Engineers often contribute to research and development, exploring novel approaches to improve AI capabilitities


✍️ What do we request?

Degree Requirements:


  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, AI, Data Science, or a related field.


Hard Skills:


  • Proficiency in programming languages like Python, R, or Java.
  • Strong understanding of machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch).
  • Knowledge of data analysis, data preprocessing, and statistical modeling.
  • Experience with neural networks, natural language processing (NLP), or computer vision.
  • Familiarity with cloud computing and deployment tools (AWS, Docker, Kubernetes


✨ What do we offer?


  • Work by objectives with quarterly monitoring.
  • Educational and technical growth path.
  • Inclusive work climate.
  • Lunch vouchers of €8 per working day.
  • Free access to Mantu Academy platform with more than 500 courses.
  • Psychological counselling.


🙌 Our ideal candidate recognizes in these values:


  • Pioneer Spirit: desire to explore new technologies, ideas, and skills to build a more sustainable world.
  • Care: commitment to promoting diversity, meritocracy, and environmental protection for a better future.
  • Performance: constant ambition to achieve excellence through creativity, innovation, and technology.
  • Trust: trust is a pillar of progress, driving freedom, creativity, and innovation.
  • Independence: independence is the basis for realizing a prosperous and agile future.

  • padronanza dell’applicativo Python

inquadramento previsto dal vigente C.C.N.L. delle imprese di assicurazione, condizioni economiche e benefit di sicuro interesse.

LIFE AS A THALES ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ENGINEERING ROLE
As an Artificial Intelligence Engineering Role within Thales, you will:
Design and develop trustworthy artificial intelligence components for various domains

Work on Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Understanding (NLU), and also to design multimodal approaches for Human-Machin Dialog including intention understanding, reasoning and hybrid AI
Work on Machine Learning, causality vs. correlation, and/or other Data driven AI technics such as Random Forest, Evolutionary Algorithms, …

Define the system capabilities thanks to a functional, logical and value analysis, describing functions to be performed to meet the real needs of the user in the various scenarii and maximising product value for Customer

Simulink
  • adopting modern Agile and DevOps processes
  • Knowledge of Data analysis and big data technologies
  • Knowledge of Cloud technologies and architectures
  • Knowledge of Edgetechnologies
  • Knowledge of object programming in particular Python (Pyorch) , Java, C ++ and relevant Data Science packages (such as numpy, scipy, scikit-learn, pandas...)
column6: • Good knowledge of operating systems
column7:
LIFE AS A THALES ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ENGINEERING ROLE

As an Artificial Intelligence Engineering Role within Thales, you will:

Design and develop trustworthy artificial intelligence components for various domains

Identify the right cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence technologies (machine learning, symbolic AI, dialogue) and develop the Artificial Intelligence component accordingly

Work on Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Understanding (NLU), and also to design multimodal approaches for Human-Machin Dialog including intention understanding, reasoning and hybrid AI

Work on Machine Learning, causality vs. correlation, and/or other Data driven AI technics such as Random Forest, Evolutionary Algorithms, …

Work on Symbolic AI, Ontology, Semantic Web, Knowledge based Reasoning, Meta-heuristics, Problem Solving, Operations Research, Decision Making and reasoning

Propose and design approach alternatives

Integrate scientific method into engineering system methodology

Ensure data knowledge and traceability

Ensure continuous technowatch and be aware of the latest trends (technical, philosophical, ethical by design)

Define the system capabilities thanks to a functional, logical and value analysis, describing functions to be performed to meet the real needs of the user in the various scenarii and maximising product value for Customer

YOUR CAREER AT THALES

Future opportunities will allow you to discover other domains or sites. You will be able to evolve and grow your competences in different areas:

Room and attention to personal development

Build your talents in another domain of Thales Group, discovering new products, new customers, new country or go to a more complex Solution

Choose between a technical expertise or a leadership path

Build an international career within a leading Engineering Group

At Thales Alenia Space we provide CAREERS and not only jobs. With Thales Alenia Space employing around 8,900 employees in 10 countries with 17 sites in Europe and a plant in the US, our mobility policy enables employees each year to develop their careers at home and abroad. Thales Alenia Space sees space as a new horizon, helping to build a better, more sustainable life on Earth #SpaceForLife. Great journeys start here, apply now!

4017421053,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-scientist-generative-ai-specialist-at-bip-4017421053?position=25&pageNum=0&refId=6VwybPj3KxlwPhEdg0E3FQ%3D%3D&trackingId=TRAEJlv7y%2FFBxK7n3Ia6fw%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Data Scientist - Generative AI Specialist,BIP,"Rome, Latium, Italy","

Bip ha creato all’interno del proprio Competence Centre “xTech” il più nutrito gruppo di Data Scientist in Italia (fonte: statistiche LinkedIn), e dall’Italia coordina anche i propri gruppi di Data Scientist locali presso le proprie sedi estere.

Nell’ambito della continua crescita ed evoluzione di questo effervescente gruppo, che opera sui nostri clienti in tutti i settori, e ci ha consentito di introdurre l’Intelligenza Artificiale presso le realtà enterprise più importanti d’Italia, siamo alla ricerca sia di profili junior/intermediate (dai neolaureati a profili con almeno 2 anni di esperienza), sia profili middle-senior (dai 3 ai 6 anni di esperienza). La provenienza da società di consulenza direzionale o informatica sarà considerata un forte plus.

Il/La Generative AI Specialist in Bip evolve non solo le proprie competenze nei modelli di Generative AI, ma anche la comprensione dei fenomeni legati al Business dei nostri Clienti e le proprie capacità di tradurli in soluzioni e poi di comunicare e utilizzare i risultati degli stessi per migliorare ed efficientare i processi.

I/Le nostri/e Generative AI Specialists verranno introdotti in contesti progettuali dove per la maggior parte i dati sono non strutturati (testi, immagini, video, suoni) e il cui focus diventa la comprensione, il processamento e la generazione partendo da tali basi documentali altrimenti non processabili con le classiche tecniche di Data Science.

I contesti progettuali spaziano dall’utilizzo di modelli pre-addestrati (es. LLM) fino all’addestramento di nuovi modelli di Generative AI passando dal fine-tuning e absorption learning da modelli commerciali.

Oltre alle progettualità, ai/alle Generative AI Specialist sarà richiesto un contributo attivo per alimentare la Community con attività di ricerca, scouting, concept di nuove soluzioni e business development.
Sarai tu ad entrare nel nostro team?
Laurea Specialistica in Ingegneria Informatica, Ingegneria Matematica, Informatica, Statistica o discipline affini (STEM)
Forte approccio quantitativo e brillanti doti analitiche
Passione e competenza in ambito data exploration, analisi dati e creazione di modelli: il nostro team disegna e sviluppa sistemi a supporto di decisioni strategiche per il business
Competenze statistiche, di Data Mining, Machine Learning, Deep Learning
Solida conoscenza e comprovata esperienza in programmazione e scripting Python
Esperienza con strumenti di version control (es. Git)
Conoscenza approfondita di database relazionali e di costrutti SQL e SQL Programming
Conoscenza di database non relazionali (es. elasticsearch, mongodb, redis)
Conoscenza di database vettoriali (es. ChromaDB, QDrant, Pinecone, ...)
Conoscenza e l’utilizzo di API Cloud di Intelligenza Artificiale di almeno uno tra i principali cloud provider (Google, Microsoft, AWS)
Conoscenza tecniche di processamento dati non strutturati
Conoscenza approfondita di Natural Language Processing (NLP), Computer Vision e relative tecniche (Text Categorization, Entity Extraction, Generation, Object Detection, Object Segmentation)
Esperienza su Reti Neurali, Convolutional Neural Network, Transformers
Conoscenza di tecniche di Generative AI e dei principali Large Language Models (LLM)
Esperienza con tecniche di allenamento e fine-tuning di reti neurali (esempio: superconvergenza, PEFT, LORA, …)
Conoscenza delle principali librerie di processamento dati non strutturati (tensorflow, torch, pytorch) e repository di modelli (huggingface)
Conoscenza delle principali tecniche di prompting (es. one/few-shot, chain-of-thought)
Indispensabile la conoscenza fluente di italiano e inglese professionali
Conoscenza di strumenti di containerizzazione (Docker, Kubernetes, etc)
Esperienza nello sviluppo e applicazione di modelli di Generative AI in contesti industriali
Esperienza nello sviluppo software e conoscenza approfondita del ciclo di vita del software
Conoscenza di framework di versionamento di dati e/o modelli (es.,  MLFlow, DVC)
Utilizzo di reti generative per la produzione controllata di contenuto (testo, immagini, video)
Sviluppo di Motori di Ricerca, Entity Extraction, Anomaly Detection su immagini
Conoscenza principali modelli di Explainable AI (SHAP, Lime, Anchors)
Esperienza con framework di lavoro AGILE (esempio: Scrum, Kanban).
Orientamento al cliente e al raggiungimento degli obiettivi
Buona attitudine a lavorare in team
Precisione e stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze
People at the center of our culture
Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialità e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.
Lavorare in BIP è un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti.

Avrai la possibilità di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attività e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, l’autonomia e la capacità di assumerti responsabilità e metterti in gioco.
Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi all’avanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.
Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworking fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.
Valorizziamo l’unicità e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutti abbiano pari opportunità di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversità e all’inclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integrità e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, più ampi.
Promuoviamo l’inserimento e l’integrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette – in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99 –.
Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prendere
mo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.
Se c’è un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte all’interno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.
L’iter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.
L’ordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.
In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunità future.
Se dovessi identificare ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.
Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato l’esperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: l’innovazione e la digitalizzazione.

Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 5000 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze più all’avanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.
Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualità su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.

Crediamo nel valore dell’eccellenza, che è la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono di lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.

DATA SCIENTIST – GENERATIVE AI SPECIALIST

Entra nel nostro mondo.

Trasforma insieme a noi.

Quale sarà la tua sfida?

Bip ha creato all’interno del proprio Competence Centre “xTech” il più nutrito gruppo di Data Scientist in Italia (fonte: statistiche LinkedIn), e dall’Italia coordina anche i propri gruppi di Data Scientist locali presso le proprie sedi estere.

Nell’ambito della continua crescita ed evoluzione di questo effervescente gruppo, che opera sui nostri clienti in tutti i settori, e ci ha consentito di introdurre l’Intelligenza Artificiale presso le realtà enterprise più importanti d’Italia, siamo alla ricerca sia di profili junior/intermediate (dai neolaureati a profili con almeno 2 anni di esperienza), sia profili middle-senior (dai 3 ai 6 anni di esperienza). La provenienza da società di consulenza direzionale o informatica sarà considerata un forte plus.

Il/La Generative AI Specialist in Bip evolve non solo le proprie competenze nei modelli di Generative AI, ma anche la comprensione dei fenomeni legati al Business dei nostri Clienti e le proprie capacità di tradurli in soluzioni e poi di comunicare e utilizzare i risultati degli stessi per migliorare ed efficientare i processi.

I/Le nostri/e Generative AI Specialists verranno introdotti in contesti progettuali dove per la maggior parte i dati sono non strutturati (testi, immagini, video, suoni) e il cui focus diventa la comprensione, il processamento e la generazione partendo da tali basi documentali altrimenti non processabili con le classiche tecniche di Data Science.

I contesti progettuali spaziano dall’utilizzo di modelli pre-addestrati (es. LLM) fino all’addestramento di nuovi modelli di Generative AI passando dal fine-tuning e absorption learning da modelli commerciali.

Oltre alle progettualità, ai/alle Generative AI Specialist sarà richiesto un contributo attivo per alimentare la Community con attività di ricerca, scouting, concept di nuove soluzioni e business development.

Sarai tu ad entrare nel nostro team?

Requisiti indispensabili:
  • Laurea Specialistica in Ingegneria Informatica, Ingegneria Matematica, Informatica, Statistica o discipline affini (STEM)

3866018696,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/construction-data-scientist-at-technip-energies-3866018696?position=28&pageNum=0&refId=6VwybPj3KxlwPhEdg0E3FQ%3D%3D&trackingId=6pmiGQYkAb2zbbgdEtPFtg%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Construction Data Scientist,Technip Energies,"Rome, Latium, Italy","About Us

At Technip Energies, we believe in a better tomorrow, and we believe we can make tomorrow better. With approximately 15,000 talented women and men, we are a global and leading engineering and technology company, with a clear vision to accelerate the energy transition. Designing and delivering added value energy solutions is what we do. If you share our determination to drive the transition to a low-carbon future, then this could be the job for you. We are currently seeking a Construction Data Scientist, reporting directly to the Global Construction Data Innovation Manager in Rome to join our Construction Data Science team based in Paris (France) and Rome (Italy).

The Global Construction Data Innovation (GCDI) is part of Global Construction, within Delivery Excellence division, and aims to develop and improve digital solutions, data science solutions (data analytics and AI), data accessibility and bi reporting for better estimating, preparing & controlling construction activities with the target to optimize construction resources, costs & duration.
The Construction Data Scientist will be part of the Construction Data Science team.

He/She will have mathematical and statistical expertise, along with natural curiosity and a creative mind. While mining and interpreting, and cleaning T.EN data, this person will be relied on to ask questions, connect the dots, and uncover hidden opportunities for realizing the data’s full potential.
He/She will support projects all around the globe to use their data as best as possible to create value and improve the management at site.
He/She will work on data produced from past construction projects for identifying benchmarking and construction patterns to optimize construction execution.
He/She will produce digital solutions to make construction management taking data driven decisions.
He/She will be at the interface between site teams, CMC teams, Data Office teams and IDS teams.
He/She will be part of the CMC team and will strive to continuously improve the performance of construction at site.
Construction Data Scientist will be performing the following task:
Enable smarter business processes by using analytics for meaningful insights to help solve problems across various domains and industries.
Analyze data to identify patterns and trends to deliver recommendations for the future.
Visualization: develop data visualization and storytelling solutions.
Business Understanding: collaborate with businesses to understand their needs and identify use cases to develop.
IT understanding: collaborate with IT and Data Office for understanding the data frame where develop, deploy, and run digital and data science products.
Data Understanding: analyze data for exploring data characteristics and their alignment with business use case.
Data Preparation: interact with Data Engineering to set up the data sources and all steps of dataset preparation.
Modelling & Validation: develop modelling methodology, features engineering, implement model, follow up model training and its validation, and definition of efficient model to deploy.
Monitoring: monitoring and fine tuning of the model developed
Deployment: interact with IT and Data Office for deployment and industrialization of data science and digital solutions developed
Prepare and deliver documentation, training and webinar about data science.
Staying up to date with the latest advancements in AI and scripting language.

We offer you not only a job, but an inspiring journey in a truly global environment where you team up to break down boundaries thanks to the innovation, creativity and pioneer spirit which drive our people.

Master’s degree in Engineering (preference for IT and mechanical engineering), or Computer Science or Mathematical

Data science curious, open mind and updated to data science state of art.

Able to manage more than one activity at the same time.
Attitude to perform the work in team, in an international and multi-cultural environment.

Availability to international mobility either for short- or long-term assignment

Knowledge of SQL (from a data scientist perspective, not necessarily dev or data engineering)
Knowledge of Scripting Language (e.g., Python, R, Julia) and data science libraries
Knowledge of main Machine Learning models (supervised and unsupervised)

About Us

 JOB DESCRIPTION

At Technip Energies, we believe in a better tomorrow, and we believe we can make tomorrow better. With approximately 15,000 talented women and men, we are a global and leading engineering and technology company, with a clear vision to accelerate the energy transition. Designing and delivering added value energy solutions is what we do. If you share our determination to drive the transition to a low-carbon future, then this could be the job for you. We are currently seeking a Construction Data Scientist, reporting directly to the Global Construction Data Innovation Manager in Rome to join our Construction Data Science team based in Paris (France) and Rome (Italy).

About The Job

The Global Construction Data Innovation (GCDI) is part of Global Construction, within Delivery Excellence division, and aims to develop and improve digital solutions, data science solutions (data analytics and AI), data accessibility and bi reporting for better estimating, preparing &
column2: controlling construction activities with the target to optimize construction resources, costs &amp

duration.

He/She will have mathematical and statistical expertise, along with natural curiosity and a creative mind. EP Produzione è la società italiana di generazione elettrica del Gruppo energetico ceco EPH. Con una capacità di generazione complessiva di 4,3 GW, attraverso cinque impianti a gas e uno a carbone, è il 5° produttore di energia in Italia
La risorsa verrà inserita nella Direzione Energy Management e sarà dedicata principalmente allo sviluppo di algoritmi strategici.
Nello Specifico, La Figura Professionale Avrà La Responsabilità Di
Sviluppare modelli di ottimizzazione delle strategie sui vari segmenti di mercato in cui opera l’azienda sulla base delle necessità delle aree funzionali della Direzione Energy Management.
Condurre analisi di dati per esaminare i processi della Direzione e migliorare l'efficienza e le operazioni.
Interpretare i dati e analizzare i risultati utilizzando tecniche statistiche.
Redazione reportistica periodica e/o on demand per la formulazione di previsioni di indirizzo relativamente all’andamento dei mercati e delle principali variabili macroeconomiche.
Approfondire novità e best practice relative agli ambiti progettuali di propria competenza.

Svolgere attività di business intelligence attraverso l'analisi dei dati e seguire progetti di trasformazioni Data & Analytics definendo le migliori strategie basate sull’utilizzo dei dati per facilitare il raggiungimento degli obiettivi di business.
Percorso di studi in ambito matematico/statistico/economico
Capacità quantitative e di problem solving supportate da un mindset analitico
Propensione a lavorare in team e a collaborare con i colleghi anche delle altre funzioni
Conoscenza dei principali applicativi Office e dei linguaggi di programmazione (a titolo esemplificativo: Python, Matlab, Visual Basic, C++)
Competenza nell'uso di strumenti di Business Intelligence (Power BI)
Orario Full-time, con possibilità di effettuare lo Smart Working per alcuni giorni della settimana.
Disponibilità ad effettuare brevi ed occasionali trasferte.

4018565210,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/global-oil-gas-senior-data-scientist-at-matchatalent-4018565210?position=30&pageNum=0&refId=6VwybPj3KxlwPhEdg0E3FQ%3D%3D&trackingId=UpC2AtU%2FWXPn4lZZSf7CGQ%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,(Global Oil Gas) Senior Data Scientist,MatchaTalent,"Rome, Latium, Italy","This role required candidate to permanently relocate at Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.

This company engages in the exploration, production, transportation, and sale of crude oil and natural gas. It operates through the following segments: Upstream, Downstream, and Corporate. The Upstream segment includes crude oil, natural gas and natural gas liquids exploration, field development, and production. The Downstream segment focuses on refining, logistics, power generation, and the marketing of crude oil, petroleum and petrochemical products, and related services to international and domestic customers. The Corporate segment offers supporting services including human resources, finance, and information technology. The company was founded on May 29, 1933 and is headquartered in Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.

We are seeking a Data Scientist to join the Sales & Operations Planning Division's (S&OP) under the Global Optimizer Department. S&OP's primary responsibility is to optimize crude allocation and operations across global manufacturing facilities. This optimization aims to maximize revenue, increase profitability, and capitalize on international market opportunities.

The division serves as the gatekeeper for linear programming (LP) at wholly owned refineries and oversees the integrated global MPIMS model. This model is crucial for optimizing global crude allocation, exploring new international markets, and integrating operational options.

As a Data Scientist, your main role will involve analyzing and structuring large volumes of real-time and historical data. You will build algorithms and solutions around this data to facilitate decision-making within the company. Your work will be pivotal in supporting the company's forecasting and predictive digital strategy, contributing to the development of advanced solutions at the Downstream Digital Center.
Formulate and lead multifaceted analytic studies against large volumes of data.
Interpret and analyze data using exploratory mathematical and statistical techniques based on the scientific method.
Coordinate research and analytic activities utilizing various data points (unstructured and structured) and employ programming to clean, massage, and organize the data.
Experiment against data points, provide information based on experiment results, and offer previously undiscovered solutions to complex data challenges.
Lead all data experiments tasked by the Data Science Team.
Coordinate with Data Engineers to build data environments providing data identified by Data Analysts, Data Integrators, Knowledge Managers, and Intel Analysts.
Develop methodology and processes for prioritization and scheduling of projects.
Analyze problems and determine root causes.
Define company data assets (data models), Spark, SparkSQL, and HiveSQL jobs to populate data models.
Work closely with all business units and engineering teams to develop strategy for long-term data platform architecture.
Willingness to relocate to Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.
Hold a Bachelor's degree in Operations Research, Industrial Engineering, Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Physics, Computer Science, or related fields. An advanced degree is preferred.
Have 5-7 years of professional experience in a related field.
Proficiency with one or more programming languages (Java, C++, Python, R, etc.).
Demonstrate experience applying data science methods to real-world data problems.
Experience in utilizing visualization tools to leverage the growing volume of available information.

This role required candidate to permanently relocate at Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.

About the Company



This company engages in the exploration, production, transportation, and sale of crude oil and natural gas. It operates through the following segments: Upstream, Downstream, and Corporate. The Upstream segment includes crude oil, natural gas and natural gas liquids exploration, field development, and production. The Downstream segment focuses on refining, logistics, power generation, and the marketing of crude oil, petroleum and petrochemical products, and related services to international and domestic customers. The Corporate segment offers supporting services including human resources, finance, and information technology. The company was founded on May 29, 1933 and is headquartered in Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.

Job Summary

We are seeking a Data Scientist to join the Sales &
column2: Operations Planning Division's (S&amp
column3: OP) under the Global Optimizer Department. S&amp
column4:
OP's primary responsibility is to optimize crude allocation and operations across global manufacturing facilities. This optimization aims to maximize revenue, increase profitability, and capitalize on international market opportunities.

The division serves as the gatekeeper for linear programming (LP) at wholly owned refineries and oversees the integrated global MPIMS model. This model is crucial for optimizing global crude allocation, exploring new international markets, and integrating operational options.

As a Data Scientist, your main role will involve analyzing and structuring large volumes of real-time and historical data. You will build algorithms and solutions around this data to facilitate decision-making within the company. Your work will be pivotal in supporting the company's forecasting and predictive digital strategy, contributing to the development of advanced solutions at the Downstream Digital Center.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Formulate and lead multifaceted analytic studies against large volumes of data.
  • Interpret and analyze data using exploratory mathematical and statistical techniques based on the scientific method.
  • Coordinate research and analytic activities utilizing various data points (unstructured and structured) and employ programming to clean, massage, and organize the data.
  • Experiment against data points, provide information based on experiment results, and offer previously undiscovered solutions to complex data challenges.
  • Lead all data experiments tasked by the Data Science Team.
  • Coordinate with Data Engineers to build data environments providing data identified by Data Analysts, Data Integrators, Knowledge Managers, and Intel Analysts.
  • Develop methodology and processes for prioritization and scheduling of projects.
  • Analyze problems and determine root causes.
  • Define company data assets (data models), Spark, SparkSQL, and HiveSQL jobs to populate data models.
  • Work closely with all business units and engineering teams to develop strategy for long-term data platform architecture.

Requirements:

  • Willingness to relocate to Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.
  • Hold a Bachelor's degree in Operations Research, Industrial Engineering, Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Physics, Computer Science, or related fields. An advanced degree is preferred.
  • Have 5-7 years of professional experience in a related field.
  • Proficiency with one or more programming languages (Java, C++, Python, R, etc.).
  • Demonstrate experience applying data science methods to real-world data problems.
  • Experience in utilizing visualization tools to leverage the growing volume of available information.
